user_query: What is TOPAZ1?

user_query: What is the basis of the methidiumpropyl-EDTA sequencing (MPE-seq) method?
chatgpt_response: The basis of the methidiumpropyl-EDTA sequencing (MPE-seq) method is the use of the MPE–Fe(II) complex to intercalate into DNA and generate single- and double-stranded DNA breaks in the presence of oxygen.
